response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, I propose to sell it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that such a remarkable product finds a home where it can be appreciated and utilized to its full potential. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget.", "product_price": 1200000}
